name: Custodian "Nightstalker" SMG
name_cn: 监管者 冲锋枪 “夜行者迷彩”
description:
Manufacturer: Kastak Arms
Item Type: SMG
Class: Energy (Laser)
Magazine Size: 60
Rate Of Fire: 800 rpm
Effective Range: 30 m
Attachments: Optics (S1), Barrel (S1), Underbarrel (S1)
The Custodian SMG from Kastak Arms focuses on a high rate of fire over damage and accuracy making it an ideal choice for sweeping through tight environments and close quarters combat.
description_cn:
制造商：卡斯塔克武器(Kastak Arms)
物品类型：冲锋枪
类别：能量 (激光)
弹匣容量：60
射速：800 rpm
有效射程：30 米
附件：瞄具 (S1)，枪管 (S1)，下挂 (S1)
来自卡斯塔克武器的"监管者"冲锋枪着重于高杀伤力，高射速和准确度，使其成为在狭窄环境和近距离战斗中扫荡的理想选择.

shop_buy.layout_name_cn: 斯坦顿(Stanton)-赫-L3-荷枪实弹武器店
